mapper.select:
SELECT attendanceClassChild.attendanceClassChildId, attendanceClassChild.dealWithNumber, attendanceClassChild.dealWithName, attendanceClassChild.ignoreValue, attributeGatherChild_1.Name AS 'chulijieguo.name', attendanceClassChild.resultId, attendanceClassChild.wayId, attributeGatherChild.Name AS 'sherufangshi.name', attendanceClassChild.attendanceCTypeId, attributeGatherChild_2.Name AS 'kaoqinleibie.name' FROM attendanceClassChild INNER JOIN attributeGatherChild AS attributeGatherChild_1 ON attendanceClassChild.resultId = attributeGatherChild_1.attributeGatherChildId INNER JOIN attributeGatherChild ON attendanceClassChild.wayId = attributeGatherChild.attributeGatherChildId INNER JOIN attributeGatherChild AS attributeGatherChild_2 ON attendanceClassChild.attendanceCTypeId = attributeGatherChild_2.attributeGatherChildId where attendanceClassChild.deleteNo=0
and attendanceClassChild.attendanceCTypeId= #{attendanceCTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
